subject: Re:. Looking fo.r friend.?
body:
Dear friend,
I found your picture on one of the websites, can we talk to 
each other? I might be coming to your plbace in fbew weeks.
This would be a great oppobrtunity to meet each other.
Btw, I am a woman. I am 25. Drop me a line at clwyf@BounceEmail.info
